meanings.definition: A military attack at night by soldiers wearing camisades.
meanings.sent1: During the battle, the soldiers planned a camisades to catch the enemy off guard.
meanings.sent2: The camisades were successful in surprising the opposing army.
meanings.sent3: The soldiers decided to organize a camisades to have some fun and test their skills.
meanings.sent4: The camisades was like a silent ghost creeping through the night.
meanings.sent5: The camisades painted a picture of bravery and strategy in the darkness.

meanings.definition: To carry out a surprise attack at night wearing camisades.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers planned to camisades the enemy camp under the cover of darkness.
meanings.sent2: They camisadesed the fortress and took the defenders by surprise.
meanings.sent3: The troops decided to camisades as a training exercise for stealth tactics.
meanings.sent4: The general ordered his troops to camisades like shadows in the night.
meanings.sent5: The soldiers camisadesed with precision and skill, achieving their objective swiftly.
